channel.title: HOME on Jhon Vargas
channel.description: Recent content in HOME on Jhon Vargas

item.title: Churn Prediction using Suvirval Analysis
item.description: Brief : The main idea of the project is to predict when customer will churn and which parameters is more relevant then compare with suvirval analysis.

item.title: Car Plate Automatic Detection
item.description: Brief : The main idea of the project is to automate the car plate detection using LBP algorithm. For this, we create dataset from raw data using a set of Computer Vision techniques.

item.title: Hosting Hugo Static Web
item.description: In this new entry, we will check how to publish our hugo site. First, we will do using github pages and then changing the domain name as custom one.

item.title: Pointers in C++
item.description: This post focus in pointers c++ 17 and beyond…

item.title: Linux Customizing
item.description: The iam of this article is to create a repository about linux hints during daily work days.

item.title: Time Series Analysis Project
item.description: Brief : This project aims to forecast Dioxid of Carbone(C02) concentration in the Atmosphere analyzing the trendy and seasonal behaviours.

item.title: Customizing your theme
item.description: After download a theme, you saw that this theme does not fit your necessities.

item.title: Meeting Hugo
item.description: For general flow, first hugo check files int he original folders and files, structures and so on.

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Here are some details to help you getting started with this theme.

item.title: Archetypes management
item.description: The archetypes are defined in the archetypes folder, for both post and portfolio.

item.title: Manage Your Menu
item.description: Menu in the sidebar can be defined within the config.toml or directly in the files. I prefer the config file approach, as this menu is pretty simple.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: Introduction of the shortcodes defined in the personal-web theme.

item.title: Config File
item.description:
Here is the basic config file used for personal-web.

You can use it as a base for your website.

item.title: Open Graph image
item.description: Within any page, you can add in the FrontMatter a images array that will be used to define a specific Open Graph image. For example, see content/_index.md page: images: ["/images/sample.jpg"]
